tool_description: Sets up and validates vendor payment methods including bank account verification, payment routing configuration, and compliance checks for financial transactions.

payment_method.description: Preferred payment method (ach, wire_transfer, check, credit_card)

account_number.description: Bank account number or payment account identifier

routing_number.description: Bank routing number for ACH/wire transfers

bank_name.description: Name of the bank or financial institution

error_messages: Invalid payment method: Use one of [ach, wire_transfer, check, credit_card].
Account verification failed: Unable to verify the provided account details with the financial institution.
Missing routing information: ACH and wire transfers require valid routing_number and bank_name.
Account number format invalid: Account number format doesn't match the selected payment method requirements.
Bank not supported: The specified bank is not supported for automated payments.
usage: Provide vendor_id, payment_method, and account_number. For ACH/wire transfers, also include routing_number and bank_name. The tool will verify and configure the payment setup.

transaction_fees.description: Associated transaction fees for this payment method
